Articles.Content: Doing Career Mode, version 1.0.4, Normal difficulty. My next step in my career is to get to the Mun, I have upgrade the Launch pad to, well, I guess you would call it Tier 2. I built a ship appr. 34t, and I do not have the Launch Stability Enhancers(not enough science). I can't launch my ship, I assume the nozzles of my craft are getting stuck in the launch pad grate? I can start the SSR's (BACC Thumpers) and nothing happens, then I hit the "stage" button, and wahlah! I launch, but the horrible spin is not very conducive to a successful trip to space. Help!

Hi Mango, yeah the tier 2 pad is sticky, it's the grill I think, your best option is to use launch clamps, though there is a bug with them, so another option is to use decoupler "feet".

I also find that by moving my craft off to the side far enough it'll be on the concrete and won't stick.
